themes.title: Verticalized AI Adoption
themes.summary: Niche, task-specific AI tools outpace general copilots among solo professionals.

claims.text: Vertical-specific AI tools show stronger adoption than generic copilots in niche domains.
Local-first storage and privacy are key buying drivers for solo users.

themes.title: Decision Log Advantage
themes.summary: Teams maintaining decision logs report faster iteration velocity.

claims.text: Maintaining a decision log correlates with ~20% faster shipping over a quarter.
Connecting insights to decisions and next steps creates outsized value.
